title: Reorder header navigation: About Us after Industries We Serve

requirements.summary: Reorder top-level navigation so "About Us" appears immediately after "Industries We Serve" in both desktop header and mobile menu without changing labels, paths, or dropdown behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: In the desktop header, the top-level menu order is: Home, Our Solutions, Industries We Serve, About Us, Contact Us.
In the mobile menu, the top-level menu order matches the desktop header order.
Only the ordering changes; labels, paths, dropdown children, and hover/dropdown behavior remain unchanged.

file_operations.description: Reorder the exported navigationConfig array so items appear in this order: home, solutions, industries, about, contact. Preserve existing item objects exactly (same ids, labels, paths, children arrays), changing only their position in the top-level array to satisfy desktop and mobile header rendering.
